name: Progeny (Moonlit Studio)
description:
Entry into 2023 Global Game Jam at KSU Site

After the hero disappeared on a quest to heal a decaying World Tree, his daughter now follows in his footsteps to uncover the mystery of his disappearance and finish the job.

Controls:
WASD- Move
Left Mouse- Attack
F- Interact
Tab- Swap Characters
Space - Dodge

Credits:
Abigail Kerul - Programming
Ashley Lawrence - Art
Cameron Dale - Music & Sound
